questions.question: In the 1985 film 'Back to the Future', what model of car is used as the time machine?
Which TV show, premiering in 1984, featured a group of women working at an interior design firm in Atlanta, Georgia?
In the cult classic 'The Princess Bride' from 1987, who says the iconic line, 'Hello, my name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die'?
Which 1979 film, directed by Ridley Scott, features the character Ellen Ripley?
incorrectAnswers: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
